overview: I hear! An active verb but rare at the time us.  What if all these voices were heard?  What would happen if you were really listening too?  And if they told you they would listen to you would you speak up or stay silent? The film was made in the context of the 5th Panorama Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki with the theme DEACTIVATION.
title: Ak(o)initoi
